# Node.js
node_modules/
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# Development files
.env
.env.local
.env.*.local

# Logs
logs/
*.log

# Runtime data
pids/
*.pid
*.seed
*.pid.lock

# Coverage directory used by tools like istanbul
coverage/

# Dependency directories
.pnp/
.pnp.js

# Optional npm cache directory
.npm

# Optional REPL history
.node_repl_history

# Output of 'npm pack'
*.tgz

# Yarn Integrity file
.yarn-integrity

# dotenv environment variable files
.env.test

# IDE files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# Git
.git/
.gitignore

# Docker
Dockerfile
docker-compose.yml
.dockerignore

# Replit specific
.replit
replit.nix

# Documentation
README*.md
LOCAL_SETUP.md
docs/

# Test files
test/
tests/
__tests__/

# Build artifacts (will be built in container)
dist/

# Temporary files
tmp/
temp/

# Database files
*.db
*.sqlite

# Backup files
*.backup
*.bak

# Editor directories and files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.suo
*.ntvs*
*.njsproj
*.sln
